column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH- A 29-year-old Malaysian man has died in the home rented to a  Vietnamese girl. The case happened at 6:30 am
column5: at the ground floor of a 12-room rental house in Boeng Keng Kang II commune
column6: Boeng Keng Kang district.------ TEE CHEN PANG
column9: according to police.------ Before the incident on the night of July 31
column11: the Malaysian man was sleeping in the Vietnamese woman’s house. In the morning the woman couldn’t wake the victim and discovered he was dead.------The report says he died of a heart attack after taking too many drugs (unspecified).------The body was then taken to Stung Meanchey pagoda. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/898639.html------*A man of the same name and age was r------ecently fined in Singapore------ for entering without declaring $60
